verses.verse: לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- shall not תִרְאֶה֩ <S%H7200><s%> tir-'Eh Thou shalt not see אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- שׁ֨וֹר <S%H7794><s%> Shor ox אָחִ֜יךָ <S%H251><s%> 'a-Chi-cha thy brother's א֤וֹ <S%H176><s%> o or אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- שֵׂיוֹ֙ <S%H7716><s%> se-Yo or his sheep נִדָּחִ֔ים <S%H5080><s%> nid-da-Chim, go astray וְהִתְעַלַּמְתָּ֖ <S%H5956><s%> ve-hit-'al-lam-Ta and hide מֵהֶ֑ם <S%H1992><s%> me-Hem; you הָשֵׁ֥ב <S%H7725><s%> ha-Shev thyself from them thou shalt in any case תְּשִׁיבֵ֖ם <S%H7725><s%> te-shi-Vem bring them again לְאָחִֽיךָ׃ <S%H251><s%> le-'a-Chi-cha. unto thy brother

וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> ve-'im- If לֹ֨א <S%H3808><s%> lo is not קָר֥וֹב <S%H7138><s%> ka-Rov [be] not nigh אָחִ֛יךָ <S%H251><s%> 'a-Chi-cha And if thy brother אֵלֶ֖יךָ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-cha about וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo not יְדַעְתּ֑וֹ <S%H3045><s%> ye-da'-To; unto thee or if thou know וַאֲסַפְתּוֹ֙ <S%H622><s%> va-'a-saf-To him not then thou shalt bring אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about תּ֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> Toch it unto בֵּיתֶ֔ךָ <S%H1004><s%> bei-Te-cha, thine own house וְהָיָ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah shall remain עִמְּךָ֗ <S%H5973><s%> 'im-me-Cha, you עַ֣ד <S%H5704><s%> 'ad until דְּרֹ֤שׁ <S%H1875><s%> de-Rosh seek אָחִ֙יךָ֙ <S%H251><s%> 'a-Chi-cha and it shall be with thee until thy brother אֹת֔וֹ <S%H853><s%> o-To, וַהֲשֵׁבֹת֖וֹ <S%H7725><s%> va-ha-she-vo-To after it and thou shalt restore it to him again לֽוֹ׃ lo.

וְכֵ֧ן <S%H3651><s%> ve-Chen In like manner תַּעֲשֶׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> ta-'a-Seh shalt thou do לַחֲמֹר֗וֹ <S%H2543><s%> la-cha-mo-Ro, with his ass וְכֵ֣ן <S%H3651><s%> ve-Chen the same תַּעֲשֶׂה֮ <S%H6213><s%> ta-'a-Seh and so shalt thou do לְשִׂמְלָתוֹ֒ <S%H8071><s%> le-sim-la-To with his raiment וְכֵ֣ן <S%H3651><s%> ve-Chen likewise תַּעֲשֶׂ֜ה <S%H6213><s%> ta-'a-Seh shalt thou do לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> le-chol anything אֲבֵדַ֥ת <S%H9><s%> 'a-ve-Dat and with all lost thing אָחִ֛יךָ <S%H251><s%> 'a-Chi-cha of thy brother's אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which תֹּאבַ֥ד <S%H6><s%> to-Vad which he hath lost מִמֶּ֖נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> mi-Men-nu and you וּמְצָאתָ֑הּ <S%H4672><s%> u-me-tza-Tah; and thou hast found לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo are not תוּכַ֖ל <S%H3201><s%> tu-Chal likewise thou mayest לְהִתְעַלֵּֽם׃ <S%H5956><s%> le-hit-'al-Lem. not hide ס sa-Mek

לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- shall not תִרְאֶה֩ <S%H7200><s%> tir-'Eh Thou shalt not see אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- חֲמ֨וֹר <S%H2543><s%> cha-Mor ass אָחִ֜יךָ <S%H251><s%> 'a-Chi-cha thy brother's א֤וֹ <S%H176><s%> o or שׁוֹרוֹ֙ <S%H7794><s%> sho-Ro or his ox נֹפְלִ֣ים <S%H5307><s%> no-fe-Lim fall down בַּדֶּ֔רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> bad-De-rech, by the way וְהִתְעַלַּמְתָּ֖ <S%H5956><s%> ve-hit-'al-lam-Ta and hide מֵהֶ֑ם <S%H1992><s%> me-Hem; you הָקֵ֥ם <S%H6965><s%> ha-Kem thyself from them thou shalt surely תָּקִ֖ים <S%H6965><s%> ta-Kim help him to lift [them] up again עִמּֽוֹ׃ <S%H5973><s%> im-Mo. with ס sa-Mek

לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- nor יִהְיֶ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yeh wear כְלִי־ <S%H3627><s%> che-li- shall not wear that which pertaineth גֶ֙בֶר֙ <S%H1397><s%> ge-ver unto a man עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and אִשָּׁ֔ה <S%H802><s%> 'ish-Shah, The woman וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- nor יִלְבַּ֥שׁ <S%H3847><s%> yil-Bash put גֶּ֖בֶר <S%H1397><s%> Ge-ver neither shall a man שִׂמְלַ֣ת <S%H8071><s%> sim-Lat garment אִשָּׁ֑ה <S%H802><s%> 'ish-Shah; on a woman's כִּ֧י <S%H3588><s%> ki for תוֹעֲבַ֛ת <S%H8441><s%> to-'a-Vat [are] abomination יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh God אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha thy God כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- whoever עֹ֥שֵׂה <S%H6213><s%> 'O-seh for all that do אֵֽלֶּה׃ <S%H428><s%> 'El-leh. so פ Peh

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki If יִקָּרֵ֣א <S%H7122><s%> yik-ka-Re chance קַן־ <S%H7064><s%> kan- nest צִפּ֣וֹר׀ <S%H6833><s%> tzip-Por If a bird's לְפָנֶ֡יךָ <S%H6440><s%> le-fa-Nei-cha to be before בַּדֶּ֜רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> bad-De-rech thee in the way בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> be-chol any עֵ֣ץ׀ <S%H6086><s%> 'etz in any tree א֣וֹ <S%H176><s%> o or עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on הָאָ֗רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz, or on the ground אֶפְרֹחִים֙ <S%H667><s%> 'ef-ro-Chim [whether they be] young ones א֣וֹ <S%H176><s%> o or בֵיצִ֔ים <S%H1000><s%> vei-Tzim, or eggs וְהָאֵ֤ם <S%H517><s%> ve-ha-'Em and the dam רֹבֶ֙צֶת֙ <S%H7257><s%> ro-Ve-tzet sitting עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and הָֽאֶפְרֹחִ֔ים <S%H667><s%> ha-'ef-ro-Chim, upon the young א֖וֹ <S%H176><s%> o or עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on הַבֵּיצִ֑ים <S%H1000><s%> hab-bei-Tzim; or upon the eggs לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- shall not תִקַּ֥ח <S%H3947><s%> tik-Kach thou shalt not take הָאֵ֖ם <S%H517><s%> ha-'Em the dam עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- with הַבָּנִֽים׃ <S%H1121><s%> hab-ba-Nim. with the young

שַׁלֵּ֤חַ <S%H7971><s%> shal-Le-ach [But] thou shalt in any wise תְּשַׁלַּח֙ <S%H7971><s%> te-shal-Lach go אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָאֵ֔ם <S%H517><s%> ha-'Em, let the dam וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַבָּנִ֖ים <S%H1121><s%> hab-ba-Nim the young תִּֽקַּֽח־ <S%H3947><s%> tik-kach- and take לָ֑ךְ Lach; לְמַ֙עַן֙ <S%H4616><s%> le-Ma-'an order יִ֣יטַב <S%H3190><s%> Yi-tav to thee that it may be well לָ֔ךְ Lach, וְהַאֲרַכְתָּ֖ <S%H748><s%> ve-ha-'a-rach-Ta with thee and [that] thou mayest prolong יָמִֽים׃ <S%H3117><s%> ya-Mim. [thy] days ס sa-Mek

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> ki When תִבְנֶה֙ <S%H1129><s%> tiv-Neh When thou buildest בַּ֣יִת <S%H1004><s%> Ba-yit house חָדָ֔שׁ <S%H2319><s%> cha-Dash, a new וְעָשִׂ֥יתָ <S%H6213><s%> ve-'a-Si-ta then thou shalt make מַעֲקֶ֖ה <S%H4624><s%> ma-'a-Keh a battlement לְגַגֶּ֑ךָ <S%H1406><s%> le-gag-Ge-cha; for thy roof וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- you will not תָשִׂ֤ים <S%H7760><s%> ta-Sim that thou bring דָּמִים֙ <S%H1818><s%> da-Mim not blood בְּבֵיתֶ֔ךָ <S%H1004><s%> be-vei-Te-cha, upon thine house כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- if יִפֹּ֥ל <S%H5307><s%> yip-Pol if any man הַנֹּפֵ֖ל <S%H5307><s%> han-no-Fel fall מִמֶּֽנּוּ׃ <S%H4480><s%> mi-Men-nu. at ס sa-Mek

לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- shall not תִזְרַ֥ע <S%H2232><s%> tiz-Ra' Thou shalt not sow כַּרְמְךָ֖ <S%H3754><s%> kar-me-Cha thy vineyard כִּלְאָ֑יִם <S%H3610><s%> kil-'A-yim; with divers seeds פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> pen- or תִּקְדַּ֗שׁ <S%H6942><s%> tik-Dash, be defiled הַֽמְלֵאָ֤ה <S%H4395><s%> ham-le-'Ah lest the fruit הַזֶּ֙רַע֙ <S%H2233><s%> haz-Ze-ra' of thy seed אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which תִּזְרָ֔ע <S%H2232><s%> tiz-Ra', which thou hast sown וּתְבוּאַ֖ת <S%H8393><s%> u-te-vu-'At and the fruit הַכָּֽרֶם׃ <S%H3754><s%> hak-Ka-rem. of thy vineyard ס sa-Mek

לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- shall not תַחֲרֹ֥שׁ <S%H2790><s%> ta-cha-Rosh Thou shalt not plow בְּשׁוֹר־ <S%H7794><s%> be-shor- with an ox וּבַחֲמֹ֖ר <S%H2543><s%> u-va-cha-Mor and an ass יַחְדָּֽו׃ <S%H3162><s%> yach-Dav. together ס sa-Mek

לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> lo shall not תִלְבַּשׁ֙ <S%H3847><s%> til-Bash Thou shalt not wear שַֽׁעַטְנֵ֔ז <S%H8162><s%> sha-'at-Nez, a garment of divers sorts צֶ֥מֶר <S%H6785><s%> Tze-mer [as] of woollen וּפִשְׁתִּ֖ים <S%H6593><s%> u-fish-Tim and linen יַחְדָּֽו׃ <S%H3162><s%> yach-Dav. together ס sa-Mek

גְּדִלִ֖ים <S%H1434><s%> ge-di-Lim thee fringes תַּעֲשֶׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> ta-'a-seh- Thou shalt make לָּ֑ךְ Lach; עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on אַרְבַּ֛ע <S%H702><s%> 'ar-Ba' upon the four כַּנְפ֥וֹת <S%H3671><s%> kan-Fot quarters כְּסוּתְךָ֖ <S%H3682><s%> ke-su-te-Cha of thy vesture אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which תְּכַסֶּה־ <S%H3680><s%> te-chas-seh- wherewith thou coverest בָּֽהּ׃ Bah. ס sa-Mek

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- If יִקַּ֥ח <S%H3947><s%> yik-Kach take אִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish If any man אִשָּׁ֑ה <S%H802><s%> 'ish-Shah; a wife וּבָ֥א <S%H935><s%> u-Va and go in אֵלֶ֖יהָ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-ha about וּשְׂנֵאָֽהּ׃ <S%H8130><s%> u-se-ne-'Ah. unto her and hate

וְשָׂ֥ם <S%H7760><s%> ve-Sam And give לָהּ֙ lah עֲלִילֹ֣ת <S%H5949><s%> 'a-li-Lot occasions דְּבָרִ֔ים <S%H1697><s%> de-va-Rim, of speech וְהוֹצִ֥יא <S%H3318><s%> ve-ho-Tzi against her and bring up עָלֶ֖יהָ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lei-ha and שֵׁ֣ם <S%H8034><s%> shem name רָ֑ע <S%H7451><s%> Ra'; an evil וְאָמַ֗ר <S%H559><s%> ve-'a-Mar, upon her and say אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָאִשָּׁ֤ה <S%H802><s%> ha-'ish-Shah this woman הַזֹּאת֙ <S%H2063><s%> haz-zoT I לָקַ֔חְתִּי <S%H3947><s%> la-Kach-ti, I took וָאֶקְרַ֣ב <S%H7126><s%> va-'ek-Rav and when I came אֵלֶ֔יהָ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-ha, about וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- did not מָצָ֥אתִי <S%H4672><s%> ma-Tza-ti to her I found לָ֖הּ lah בְּתוּלִֽים׃ <S%H1331><s%> be-tu-Lim. her not a maid

וְלָקַ֛ח <S%H3947><s%> ve-la-Kach take אֲבִ֥י <S%H1><s%> 'a-Vi Then shall the father; הַנַּעַר han-na-'ar כהַֽנַּעֲרָ֖ה <S%H5291><s%> han-na-'a-Rah damsel קוְאִמָּ֑הּ <S%H517><s%> ve-'im-Mah; and her mother וְהוֹצִ֜יאוּ <S%H3318><s%> ve-ho-Tzi-'u and bring forth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- בְּתוּלֵ֧י <S%H1331><s%> be-tu-Lei virginity; הַנַּעַר han-na-'ar כהַֽנַּעֲרָ֛ה <S%H5291><s%> han-na-'a-Rah damsel קאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to זִקְנֵ֥י <S%H2205><s%> zik-Nei unto the elders הָעִ֖יר <S%H5892><s%> ha-'Ir of the city הַשָּֽׁעְרָה׃ <S%H8179><s%> hash-Sha-'e-rah. in the gate

וְאָמַ֛ר <S%H559><s%> ve-'a-Mar shall say אֲבִ֥י <S%H1><s%> 'a-Vi father; הַנַּעַר han-na-'ar כהַֽנַּעֲרָ֖ה <S%H5291><s%> han-na-'a-Rah damsel קאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הַזְּקֵנִ֑ים <S%H2205><s%> haz-ze-ke-Nim; unto the elders אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- בִּתִּ֗י <S%H1323><s%> bit-Ti, my daughter נָתַ֜תִּי <S%H5414><s%> na-Tat-ti I gave לָאִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> la-'Ish unto this man הַזֶּ֛ה <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh to this לְאִשָּׁ֖ה <S%H802><s%> le-'ish-Shah to wife וַיִּשְׂנָאֶֽהָ׃ <S%H8130><s%> vai-yis-na-'E-ha. and he hateth

וְהִנֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-neh- and behold ה֡וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu he שָׂם֩ <S%H7760><s%> sam And lo he hath given עֲלִילֹ֨ת <S%H5949><s%> 'a-li-Lot occasions דְּבָרִ֜ים <S%H1697><s%> de-va-Rim of speech לֵאמֹ֗ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor, [against her] saying לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- did not מָצָ֤אתִי <S%H4672><s%> ma-Tza-ti I found לְבִתְּךָ֙ <S%H1323><s%> le-vit-te-Cha not thy daughter בְּתוּלִ֔ים <S%H1331><s%> be-tu-Lim, a maid וְאֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> ve-'El-leh this בְּתוּלֵ֣י <S%H1331><s%> be-tu-Lei virginity בִתִּ֑י <S%H1323><s%> vit-Ti; and yet these [are the tokens of] my daughter's וּפָֽרְשׂוּ֙ <S%H6566><s%> u-fa-re-Su And they shall spread הַשִּׂמְלָ֔ה <S%H8071><s%> has-sim-Lah, the cloth לִפְנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before זִקְנֵ֥י <S%H2205><s%> zik-Nei the elders הָעִֽיר׃ <S%H5892><s%> ha-'Ir. of the city
